divs: sighting detailswas sitting on the sofa watching a movie with my friend and we just happened to look out to our balcony and saw this sphere (what he describes it as\circle to me) shape pulsating with lights and we went out on to the balcony to see make sure it wasn't a plane because there was a plane stationed above\next to it or what we believe to be a plane and we watched it for 15 minutes but we heard no sound no sound whatsoever!...after 15 minutes it was just gone but during those 15 minutes the object was pulsating various beautiful colors...red, green, orange, purple, pink and it was to big to be a star and stars don't just vanish. it did come back again but it was not there that long and it just vanished again and it was a beautiful cloudless sky tonight.
Summary: Pulsating lights stayed in the same place for 15 min. and was just gone.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around May 19th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
